str2: Or Mariam of Hebrew origin; Maria or Mariam, the name of six Christian females.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A (lunar) month. A primary word; a month.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To turn back, return. From hupo and strepho; to turn under, i.e. To return.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.
